description: Lists all invocations associated with a specific session. For more information about sessions, see Store and retrieve conversation history and context with Amazon Bedrock sessions.

parameters.name: sessionIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the session to list invocations for. You can specify either the session's sessionId or its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: invocationSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of invocation summaries associated with the session.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the invocation was created.

nested_items.name: invocationId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the invocation in UUID format.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the session associated with the invocation.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
